title: match-making in normals
body:
I cant imagine it would be that hard to stop this from happening, I just want to play a fair game without having to wait the extra 5-10 min in champ select
http://grabilla.com/05910-2dfa7d06-ee55-4853-8aec-860fa9576dfe.png

replies.body:
Normals dude. This only means that your normal score is the same as all the other normals scores.

That means that the last time you all played normals was when you were all the same skill level, or those higher ranks have been trying shit in normals as "It is only normals" and failing, therefore bringing their level down to that unranked dude.

If they played for real, they wouldn't be sitting in that game, or as I said, the last time they played they were actually at that level and have been grinding ranked for some time.
But forcing an extra 5-10 minutes just to play with players your skill level could easily be reduced to 60 seconds. Plus I wont get flamed for going jungle graves.
My point is that it is normals, not ranked. Whilst those players ranks are much much higher than others, their skill in normals according to the game rankings are all the same.
omg that challenger yas kda HILARIOUS

yeah that's quite unfortunate :(
but at least that wasn't your ranked games.
